object.title: Article 1 - Purpose
object.content: These Terms of Sale govern the contractual relationships between NEO Cyber Camp and its customers for the sale of online training and associated services.

price.title: Article 2 - Prices
price.content: Training prices are indicated in euros excluding taxes. Applicable VAT will be added at the time of order.

payment.title: Article 3 - Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment is made by credit card or bank transfer. Access to training is granted upon receipt of full payment.

withdrawal.title: Article 4 - Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.content: In accordance with consumer protection laws, the right of withdrawal cannot be exercised for digital content provided on an intangible medium whose execution has begun with the consumer's agreement.

access.title: Article 5 - Training Access
access.content: Access to training is personal and non-transferable. Sharing login credentials is prohibited. The duration of access is specified for each training.

liability.title: Article 6 - Liability
liability.content: NEO Cyber Camp is committed to providing quality training. However, success in certifications cannot be guaranteed and depends on the learner's personal investment.

object.title: Article 1 - Purpose
object.content: These Terms of Use define the rules for using the NEO Cyber Camp platform accessible at app.neocc.co.

access.title: Article 2 - Platform Access
access.content: Access to the platform requires creating a user account. Users agree to provide accurate information and keep it up to date.

labs.title: Article 3 - Lab Usage
labs.content: The virtual environments (labs) provided are intended exclusively for educational purposes. Any malicious use or unauthorized access attempt is strictly prohibited.

ip.title: Article 4 - Intellectual Property
ip.content: Training content (videos, documents, exercises) is protected by copyright. Their reproduction, distribution or modification without authorization is prohibited.

behavior.title: Article 5 - Conduct
behavior.content: Users agree to use the platform respectfully and not to disrupt its operation or other users' experience.

sanctions.title: Article 6 - Sanctions
sanctions.content: Any breach of these Terms of Use may result in suspension or deletion of the user account, without prejudice to any legal proceedings.
